title: Reforming education
description: Staying updated is imperative, especially when it comes to knowledge. We, at Dakshya Nepal, plan on reforming the traditional setting of education to digitized learning, a learning beyond walls.

title: Domain Expertise
description: Overall e-Learning solution mapped to CBSE and Pre School curriculum, specially designed for schools with multiple locations and Franchisees.

title: Building You to build Nepal
description: We strongly believe comprehensive education lays the foundation of a strong nation. And with such strong pillars supporting the nation, we will build Nepal globally.
